content.text:
I'll help you warm up by exploring the current directory structure. Let me check what's available in your working directory.

<tool_code>
Bash
command: ls -la "C:\Users\1"
</tool_code>

<tool_code>
Bash
command: find "C:\Users\1" -maxdepth 2 -type d 2>/null | head -20
</tool_code>

<tool_code>
Bash
command: find "C:\Users\1" -maxdepth 2 -type f 2>/null | head -20
</tool_code>
